title: Having Financial Peace During a Tragedy (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Financial peace after a hurricane,

Hiring people to grow a business,

Making progress when you're behind on your utilities,

Getting on the same page with a spouse.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

Carwiser

PODS Moving & Storage


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
